title: GTA V Special Edition content unlocked rogero/habib
description:

GTA V SPECIAL EDITION BLES01807

CONTENTS:

ATOMIC BLIMP
 - With access to this iconic feature of the Los Santos skyline, players can take control of the most leisurely aircraft in the Los Santos skies.

 ADDITIONAL WEAPONS
 - Your local Ammu-Nation will always be stocked with a pair of special firearms at no additional cost that also have their own unique customization options, skins and attachments - the .50 Caliber Pistol and the Bullpup Shotgun.
 - You'll also have access to the Hammer, which acts as a brutal melee weapon.

 SPECIAL ABILITY BOOST
 - Michael, Franklin and Trevor each have their own unique Special Ability, which can be activated once each of them fills up the Special Ability bar based on various actions.
 - Michael is an expert marksman, Franklin is a skilled driver with sharp reflexes, Trevor is a sociopath with a short fuse and rage.
 - With the boost, the Special Ability bar will generate 25% faster.

 STUNT PLANE TRIALS
 - Take in Los Santos and Blaine County at breakneck speeds in the Stunt Plane Trials.
 - In five thrilling and unique challenges, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll zip through mountains, deserts, oceans, and cities as you navigate through a maze of checkpoints-
 - Completing each Trial will improve the piloting skill of your character.

 BONUS OUTFITS, TATTOOS AND MORE
 - Michael, Franklin and Trevor will receive a special 20% discount in shops, along with access to special items either in their personal wardrobes or from stores.
 - Each character will receive 1 outfit each, one additional article of clothing (shirt, hoodie and jacket) each and a tattoo.

*NOTE: THE GAME CAN BE PLAYED FROM EXTERNAL AS WELL INTERNAL HARD DISK....
